name: Perpetual ASCII wind motion
description: some perpetual chill wind motion. it's a remix of the sinewave, but the bottom is narrow and is gradually getting more wider to the top.  parameters: grid=80x80 / tiles= 8px String charSet = " ░▒▓█▄▀│┤╣║╚╔╗╝┐╩└╦╠┴═┬├╬─┼┘┌¦┼└┴┬├┐"; font=Courier New length=00:47 seconds looping=yes, perfect_loop=i guess fps=60
